alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Monroe; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 8:46AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bibb, southwestern Monroe, north central Peach, Crawford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 915 AM EDT... At 845 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Horns, or near Roberta, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Fort Valley, Roberta, Payne, Culloden, Payne City, Lake Tobesofkee, Jack Brown Estates, Musella, Cross Keys, Knoxville, Wesleyan, Lizella, Skipperton, Lee Pope, Sandy Point, Horns and Fickling Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
